title: lol client launcher issues
body:
I double-click League of Legends, and the launcher opens up. I hit Launch, my mouse does the loady-circley thing, and nothing happens.
I open the task manager, the processes are running but the application is not. I have repaired the launcher countless times, I have re-installed several, restarted my computer, and I cannot figure out the issue. I had thought I had found a solution at one point but it proved futile. (Solution was to remove all record of anything RIOT games related and re-install then, but even that did not work.) Please help, I am incredibly annoyed. This has been occurring for about two months now.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is unable to establish a solid connection to our login servers, causing the sudden client disconnection that you're seeing. I recommend going through the solutions in our [**Connection Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as they commonly resolve these issues.

Let me know if this resolved the issue for you.
I can not find the way to solve this issues on the internet
